message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're starting strong, I'll take a slightly larger share this round
You took a big chunk, now it's my turn to counter
You're trying to get back in the game, but I'm not budging that much
You're getting greedy, but I'll try to make a comeback
You're getting desperate, I'll take a big chunk and leave you with scraps
You're really squeezing me now, but I'll try to hold on
You're running out of options, I'll take almost everything
You're really pushing me to the edge, but I'll try to make one last stand
You're down to almost nothing, it's almost over
You're really milking this, but I'll try to squeeze out a bit more
You've had your chance, now it's my turn to take it all
